channel.title: Mac Question
channel.description:
I manually downloaded the cache.zip file, because every time I turned off my computer I would have to download it again. Anyway, I unzipped it in the MoparScape32 folder and... I still have to download the cache every time I restart. I've played around with trial and error, but I can't seem to find wherever it's supposed to go... Do you know where I should put the cache folder on a Mac? (OS X 10.4.9 if it makes a difference)
Either way, it is working now...

item.title: Mac Question
item.dc:creator: @juandor juandor
item.description:
@juandor wrote:

I manually downloaded the cache.zip file, because every time I turned off my computer I would have to download it again. Anyway, I unzipped it in the MoparScape32 folder and… I still have to download the cache every time I restart. I’ve played around with trial and error, but I can’t seem to find wherever it’s supposed to go… Do you know where I should put the cache folder on a Mac? (OS X 10.4.9 if it makes a difference)

Either way, it is working now…
